title: Intersectional Feminism also uses Jordan Peterson Woke Sacrament
description:
The Distributist did a great video which for me cements Intersectionality is the monotheism of poly-liberationism. It also occurred to me that they use the same mechanism for meaning as Peterson's uphill cross carrying they just have a different hill and city of God. 

Feminism is for Nobody https://youtu.be/UY5tzerK4Ag
Is Feminism for everybody? https://youtu.be/n3UcEPka69c
Everydayfeminism.com is bad for women https://youtu.be/bnrOLhx6L3c
JBP doesn't understand Post-modernity https://youtu.be/cU1LhcEh8Ms
Peterson on Rebel Wisdom https://youtu.be/husJZ2THQdU

For the audio podcast mirror on Podbean http://paulvanderklay.podbean.com/
